title: Mcu641
author: Mcu641
content: Hello,¬†I am looking for an investor in a time-tested and profitable business area.Do you know crypto trading telegram channels like: Fed. RUSSIAN Insiders, Crypto Bullets, Alex Friedman? they all sell spot/futures signals to people.To make it easier to understand how much the owners of these channels earn, some specific numbers:1. TLrJGz9mCjvknzm3VTwqgm1mQ5bbdUnXxV (USDt)2. 1ETX8eU2QjWQaKgiaMYnmsf3UjDeF3Scof (BTC)(this wallet belongs to Fed. Russian Insiders channel)Owner of FED. Russian Insiders channel earns +200k$ per month, from membership sales alone (+additional earnings from Affiliates, etc.)Owner of Alex Friedman's channel also earns over $150k per month from membership sales alone.Basically, profit is quite stable and it depends more on the channel owner's own efforts or investments in marketing.¬†So I think you already understand where I'm going üòÅI have been working with these types of channel owners 2 years and helping them establish themselves in the market. I think it's time to make some money for me too.I have over 2 years of experience in this particular business. I have spent over +$300k promoting such channels, so I know very well what/how and where it works.I currently have a channel with 100k followers (not started yet)¬†I also have an agreement with a futures trading expert who is currently in the TOP 10 of all time ROI on binance exchange with over +2000% profitI can back up every word I say with facts and evidence. (I'm talking about experience, money spent on advertising, etc.)If you are interested, I would like to continue the conversation in person. My Telegram: @Crypto1981 or PM me in forum!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Mcu641 on June 21, 2023, 04:53:35 PMI have been working with these types of channel owners 2 years and helping them establish themselves in the market. I think it's time to make some money for me too.I have over 2 years of experience in this particular business. I have spent over +$300k promoting such channels, so I know very well what/how and where it works.Even the obvious cloud mining and HYIP scammers enter solid money into advertisements. Most often, it is the investor's own money. That certainly does not make them a legitimate business.If you already have 2 years of experience, surely you have some tangible evidence that this method is functional. I guess you don't expect us to trust an unknown person from the internet at word. QuoteI also have an agreement with a futures trading expert who is currently in the TOP 10 of all time ROI on binance exchange with over +2000% profit2000% profit, it sounds absolutely realistic. Just as much as the fact that some expert wants to teach others how to trade, because that 2000% is not enough for them.

comments.author: Mcu641
comments.created_time: June 21, 2023, 08:15:08 PMLast edit: June 21, 2023, 08:25:25 PM by Mcu641
comments.body: QuoteEven the obvious cloud mining and HYIP scammers enter solid money into advertisements. Most often, it is the investor's own money. That certainly does not make them a legitimate business.If you already have 2 years of experience, surely you have some tangible evidence that this method is functional. I guess you don't expect us to trust an unknown person from the internet at word. This business model is 100% legit, our customers are people who trade. They pay for a membership every month to get information. There are no cosmic offers, percentages or returns here. If information does not satisfy them, they simply do not renew their memberships.Regarding my credibility and making such investment deals. We live in the 21st century, making transactions, business, various deals is already common, so I don't see anything strange here. As for my specific case - investor will not transfer any money to me. I think it would be fairer if he directly bought ads for this project and thus contributed to it.Also we will make a contract and share project equally (website, social network accounts, bots)And yes, I have enough evidence.Quote2000% profit, it sounds absolutely realistic. Just as much as the fact that some expert wants to teach others how to trade, because that 2000% is not enough for them.No one wants to teach anyone. Customers pay for information (signals and market updates)¬†I don't know how much experience you have here, but this is a profitable business and I have given specific examples.¬†Expert I mentioned satisfies the TOP 10 best experts in the most popular crypto exchange (Binance) - this is a concrete proof that he is a professional with obvious achievements, both for a future investor and for clients.Sorry for the grammar

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: After been reading this.. I don't understand why in the earth you need a investor.If you would have done all this, you would definitely find investor true the way that you already know and trust. Also if you have invested +$300k in this already, I guess you got some money. So why don't use your own money and add it with loans so the profit only ending up in your hands and not a bunch of investors?

comments.author: Mcu641
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on June 21, 2023, 08:34:57 PMAfter been reading this.. I don't understand why in the earth you need and investor?If you would have done all this, you would definitely find investor true the way that you already know and trust. Also if you have invested +$300k in this already, I guess you got some money. So why don't use your own money and add it with loans so the profit only ending up in your hands and not a bunch of investors?Thanks for the questions.I have worked with other channel owners. Owners of other channels are not inclined to invest in new ones, because they will simply better invest more in current one.The $+300k I mentioned is my clients advertising budgets.And yes, I have my own money, but I still don't see anything strange, looking for investments in business is a normal and acceptable thing.If no one wants to contribute in the next few days, I will invest my money. It is not a problem.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Mcu641 on June 21, 2023, 08:52:43 PMAnd yes, I have my own money, but I still don't see anything strange, looking for investments in business is a normal and acceptable thing.If no one wants to contribute in the next few days, I will invest my money. It is not a problem.It's because you don't have a reputation to back up your claim and yet you're asking for investment and you are not showing us anything if all you're saying are true, it's better to invest your own money if you have no issues with financing it.Your thread is very similar to this one Double-digit monthly returns w/ audited recordsAsking for $250k without showing anything and boasting that his project is legit.

comments.author: Mcu641
comments.body: QuoteIt's because you don't have a reputation to back up your claim and yet you're asking for investment and you are not showing us anything if all you're saying are true, it's better to invest your own money if you have no issues with financing it.Your thread is very similar to this one Double-digit monthly returns w/ audited recordsAsking for $250k without showing anything and boasting that his project is legit.It's strange that you compare incomparable things.1. I have revealed the whole business principle. (And I still don't understand where you see any illegality)2. I am not offering any cosmic profits. I only give examples of how much competitors earn.3. I've already said that I have enough evidence to back up every word I say. (if you are interested, contact me - I will show you everything and I think there will be no questions)4. I am not asking you to transfer any investments to me.And I ask everyone who asks questions to read what I write. Thank you!P.s account of the author of said proposal was created purely before topic was published. Meanwhile, my account created more than a year ago.

comments.author: Mcu641
comments.body: I will wait for offers until day end.¬†If I don't find a suitable partner, I will start alone.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: If this is just a signal thing, why are you looking for investment? Where will you spend those investments? On advertisement? I don't support such scam businesses. Basically, you guys are giving suggestions to others to open a position that might go in the wrong direction, and you don't know what will happen with their money.Moreover, you charge them for the signals you provide. Why don't you start trading if you know the market movement? Instead, you are selling them on the internet and scamming people. At least, this is what I think about those free/paid signal channels. I don't want any explanation from anyone. This is a scam in my book!

comments.author: Mcu641
comments.body: 1. Fraud is when a person pays money and does not receive what he bought.I don't know if you really don't read the whole thread or what?I am not an expert or a trader. I have simply agreed with a high-level trader who has statistics to back it up. (! He is in the TOP 10 best traders of all time on Binance exchange by earned ROI %)Can results published by Binance be trusted? I think it is possible and believe me, a lot of people will be interested, because current competitors do not have any similar achievement.There are many traders who offer their own copytrading, signals and this is a normal practice. By having an additional source of income, trader thus diversifies risks.I am not interested in crypto-trading. Here is business.In response to release of investment, I will confirm that most of it will be spent on marketing.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Mcu641 on June 22, 2023, 10:37:45 AMI will wait for offers until day end.If I don't find a suitable partner, I will start alone.Isn't that the best thing for you? You claim to have knowledge and experience, a good business model and you think you can profit from all this. You have to understand that most will not invest in such projects, especially if it comes to Telegram, which is a real paradise for scammers.I don't say you're scammer, but this whole concept you present is not promising, no matter what you show that some others profit on such services (supposedly), as well as having someone who has fantastic results in trading.Quote from: Mcu641 on June 22, 2023, 12:05:33 PMI am not an expert or a trader. I have simply agreed with a high-level trader who has statistics to back it up. (! He is in the TOP 10 best traders of all time on Binance exchange by earned ROI %)First you say that you have experience, and now you claim that you are not an expert or trader, while at the same time you blindly believe that someone realizes 2000% of profits. Maybe you should read the following topic :3068 Trades Won and only 1 Trade Lost

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Mcu641 on June 22, 2023, 10:37:45 AMI will wait for offers until day end.¬†If I don't find a suitable partner, I will start alone.You're not going to get any so start alone and use your money if you really have the money, obviously, you are someone who just came here with for me is a dubious plan but not knowing how this forum works I did not see any screenshots I did not see any links, everything you've told us is speculation.You are good at storytelling, you make us believe that without showing us anything its worth investing in your business, go get a real job and stop planning to scam people

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Mcu641 on June 22, 2023, 03:02:57 PMYou probably don't read all answers and just collect activity pointsOf course, for each activity poin I get $100 as Legendary Quote from: Mcu641 on June 22, 2023, 03:02:57 PMPlease don't hang on words. I am an expert, but in marketing, not crypto trading. I know exactly what you wrote, but I want to say you don't need to be naive and you don't believe in everything you see, and I have shown you and an example of how it is possible to be "successful" in trading, although there is no profit behind that success.Quote from: Mcu641 on June 22, 2023, 03:02:57 PMI don't trust blindly, as I said statistics are confirmed. Do you think that the most popular crypto exchange is lying?The most popular CEX? The same one under investigation in several countries and operating on the verge of law from the beginning? Of course, you can trust them

comments.author: Ico.best
comments.body: Quote from: Mcu641 on June 22, 2023, 03:02:57 PMI would suggest you to find a job and not comment on nonsense.You probably don't read all answers and just collect activity pointsPlease don't hang on words. I am an expert, but in marketing, not crypto trading. I don't trust blindly, as I said statistics are confirmed. Do you think that the most popular crypto exchange is lying?I'm not going to share any screenshots here because they will immediately be stolen and used to scam people.I think this is a little ambiguous, you only said about the advantages and did not provide information about the losses incurred. Supposedly if that is true and you want to find investors, it is better to provide details on how the process works both in terms of losses and profits.Especially what you informed about futures, where in principle it is almost impossible for a trader to experience continuous profits without experiencing losses.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Mcu641 on June 22, 2023, 03:02:57 PMI would suggest you to find a job and not comment on nonsense.You probably don't read all answers and just collect activity pointsI don't think so, all the members' comments here are valid, you are not showing anything these are all just words don't accuse us of anything prove yourself first this is an open forum you have no right to stop us from posting on your thread.QuotePlease don't hang on words. I am an expert, but in marketing, not crypto trading. I don't trust blindly, as I said statistics are confirmed. Do you think that the most popular crypto exchange is lying?This is not how an expert speaks or communicates I don't see this in someone who claims QuoteI have over 2 years of experience in this particular business. I have spent over +$300k promoting such channels, so I know very well what/how and where it works.QuoteI'm not going to share any screenshots here because they will immediately be stolen and used to scam people.It's easy You can watermark your screenshots or do a video and post your screenshots and whatever you have there on your video, now I'm the one recommending what you should do.
